QuestData.Title: Trouble at Highperch
QuestData.Description: Thank you for your help, $n. You should speak with Pao'ka Swiftmountain at Highperch to the southwest.$B$BPerhaps he will know the whereabouts of the Elder Crone?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Pao'ka Swiftmountain at Highperch in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: I know nothing of the Elder Crone, Magatha. What I do know is that the Twilight's Hammer is destroying Highperch.$B$BWill you help me to stop them, $c?
